data.title: Ember | Clean Energy Policy
data.meta_description: Ember is an energy think tank that aims to accelerate the clean energy transition with data and policy.
data.text:
Global Electricity Review 2024

Renewables generated a record 30% of global electricity in 2023, driven by growth in solar and wind. With record construction of solar and wind in 2023, a new era of falling fossil generation is imminent. 2023 was likely the pivot point, marking peak emissions in the power sector.

Submission: Boggabri Coal Mine Modification

Submission to Australia’s Department of Climate Change, Energy, Environment and Water on the proposed modification of Boggabri coal mine and the potential for it to have a significant, under evaluated impact on fugitive emissions increases.

"By releasing the 'Asia Data Transparency Report', Ember has not only provided us with crucial insights but also ignited a much-needed debate in Pakistan. Their data transparency report has provided us an opportunity to initiate a conversation with government departments and relevant entities to consider making their data publicly available and accessible. This newfound pressure has catalyzed extensive efforts to develop public dashboards, and our team is using it as motivation to actively engage in bridging the data gaps highlighted by Ember's report."
